variant.p: Investment Entities (Amendments to IFRS 10, IFRS 12 and IAS 27) introduced a requirement for investment entities to measure their investments in particular subsidiaries at fair value through profit or loss instead of consolidating them. The Board also decided on specific disclosure requirements for investment entities.
